# Homepage
Welcome to my **ABB** fellow earthling!

ABB stands for **AstroBio Blog**. Any resemblance with a famous news source is purely coincidental.

This blog is divided in multiple sections (see *navigation bar*):

* **English Log**: an open diary about my English practice for my university English Class.
* **Science 4U**: a collection of scientific articles vulgarized by yours truly await you there. Topics range from random interests to specific Space-related articles (Mostly Astrobiology though).

Find out more about the redactor of this beautiful blog in the **About Me** section. 

Quick access to *Github*, *Moodle* and *UMons* websites can be found by clicking their logos on the navigation bar.

I hope you will enjoy your stay here!
